about.paragraph:
Hi there! My name is Nikol and I'm a design lover from Bulgaria. I just got my Bachelor's degree in Advertising from New Bulgarian University. I love to relate design with purpose and to experiment with colors. That's why I put strategy & concept in an otherwise creative and intuitional process. What I'm passionate about is bringing visual sense to people and making them want to interact with my designs.
My other hobbies are travelling and exploring new places. I love to observe creations of both nature and art - that's what I usually get motivated of.
I'm currently seeking a graphic designer role, so if you think I'd be a good match for your team, I'd really like us to catch up on Linkedin!
